summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in semver package (CVE-2022-25883) used by ts-loader, causing a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability with CVSS score 7.5. Issue was automatically closed when the vulnerable library was removed from the project's dependency tree.
userImpact: Users may experience denial of service if untrusted semver range data is processed during the build process.
rootCause: semver package versions before 7.5.2 contain a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability in the Range function when processing untrusted user input.
proposedFix: Upgrade semver to version 7.5.2 or later, or remove/update ts-loader dependency.
resolutionDetails: Vulnerability was resolved when the vulnerable library was removed from the project dependencies and is no longer part of the inventory.
keyQuote: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range
